title: 10 perch single story nicely built brand new house for sale in Hokandara
details:
Dear Sir /Madam.

please find the property details.

10 perches 300 meters to main road , located at Wanaguru marathon. Hokandara

Single story house with 3 beds with attached bath room, living, dining, pantry, kitchen, TV lobby, A/C rooms etc..,

Parking for 2 vehicles with roller shutter gate.
Wooden jack tree /CCTV /hotwater sola / floor tile rochel /2 barth rooms / Highly residential area. 20 foot road acces

Price. 16 million. Negotiate

Please call for more details

Regards
Dilan
